General_Description: '''Witchy Wolfen''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met a man with a delivery problem.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Is there something you need?''
*'''Man:''' ''I've got excess [[mandrake]] among my wares, and there's a witch nearby willing to pay a good price for it.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Sounds like a good match.''
*'''Man:''' ''It is, but I've got a healthy fear of the [[Wolf|wolves]] that prowl near her home. And a healthy fear of witches, come to think of it.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You want me to bring it to her.''
*'''Man:''' ''I know I asked the right person.''
(Accept – I'll handle it.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help you.''
*'''Man:''' ''The [[Fates]] are working in my favor.''
*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire'', stranger.''
Kassandra left the man, and found the witch.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''A man told me you needed this.''
*'''Witch:''' ''Ah, yes. I was wondering when this would arrive. Here, your payment.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra delivered the mandrake, and was rewarded for this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
